alert.note: Alert for Mason; Muskegon; Oceana (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued June 15 at 11:02AM EDT until June 16 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...High wave action, strong currents, and dangerous swimming conditions expected. Piers may be heavily swamped by waves. * WHERE...Mason, Oceana and Muskegon counties. * WHEN...From 2 PM EDT this afternoon through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Strong currents can pull swimmers into deeper water and high waves can sweep people off piers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The most dangerous conditions will be in the water on the south side of any piers or structures. This includes Pere Marquette beach in Muskegon.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions and do not venture out on piers. Please check with your local authorities on potential beach closures.
